@OQTs95135232 @BAMEOTUK 2/3 Minoritised ethnic‚Äô (or the similar term ‚Äòracially minoritised‚Äô) has been recommended more recently as it recognises that individuals have been minoritised through social processes of power and domination rather than just existing in distinct statistical minorities.
@OQTs95135232 @BAMEOTUK 1/3 Our definition of minoritised is a group of people who do not get access to equal power, wealth and resources as compared to the majority group.

4/4 
- We'll also be improving our processes to ensure all images we use  are appropriate and accurate, particularly those which feature accessibility and aid equipment.

We apologise that we got this wrong. We thank you for your feedback.

3/4 
- We are planning to use more bespoke photography and aim to use fewer stock images.
- We'll be exploring working with specialist, inclusive and diverse stock libraries that are specifically curated by people with lived experience
